additional_info: THE HOUSE N19 - ONE OF THE BEST NUMBER FOR THE VIEW OR FOR ANYTHING ELSE... Join the residents of Sun City, the contemporary, Georgian-American Village located in Tskneti, approximately 7 kilometers (7-10 minutes) from Tbilisi. Relax from urban noise and pollution and enjoy the fullness of life with friends and family in the peaceful and ecologically pure environment of Tskneti. All residences encompass spectacular panoramic views of the Tbilisi skyline and the Caucasus mountain range. Sun City is a gated residential community with full security, situated on a total 13,000 m2 of residential property. The community encompasses 41 privately owned, luxury residences, complete with private roof-top terraces, balconies and gardens for outdoor living and entertainment. Project is already completed.
